instructions: Please fill out these questions to the best of your ability. This will be the content of your website. If you need clarification on anything or don't want any of this information included just leave it blank/contact us:)

fields.label: Business Phone
fields.description: Where you want to be notified when you have a new lead
fields.note: You can use your personal # if you want

fields.label: Your Official Business Name
fields.note: THIS WILL BE ON YOUR BUSINESS CARDS

fields.label: Your Business Tax ID or EIN #
fields.placeholder: Input Business Tax ID or EIN #

fields.label: Link to your current website
fields.placeholder: Paste the link to your current one

fields.label: Your 'About Us' section
fields.description: 3-5 sentences about yourself and how you got started with the business (remember we are trying to build a personal brand around you!)

fields.label: Your TOP 3 cities and the Areas that you service
fields.description: Be as SPECIFIC as possible (outstanding cities, suburbs, counties, etc) DO NOT ADD MORE THAN 14

fields.label: All the services you offer
fields.description: Be as SPECIFIC as possible. List at least 4 services that your company provides

fields.label: Special highlights/Business features
fields.description: Give us a few special things about you/business that we can show off on your website!
fields.examples: 10+ Years In Business, Veteran Owned, Fully Insured, etc.

fields.label: Business Better Business Bureau (BBB) Page Link
FULL SHIPPING ADDRESS
fields.description: This is where we will send your new business cards with your updated company info
fields.placeholder: EX: 2118 S. Jackson St., Chicago, IL 60629

fields.label: Discounts for future maintenance/remarketing
fields.description: Discounts you would offer for future maintenance or friends of past customers. These will be marketed to your past customers.
fields.examples: $500 off your next roof / 10% off your next driveway wash

fields.label: Your Company Logo
fields.note: Let us know if you need us to make you one

fields.label: Do you need us to make you a logo?
Photo Submission Instructions
fields.requirements: Include a nice picture of yourself and or your team
